sections.description: Securely import WheelPros wheel data from CSV/JSON and display it as a custom post type with advanced filtering capabilities. Features memory-efficient two-phase import system, real-time progress tracking, automatic GitHub updates, vehicle fitment search, and brand management.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin ZIP file
2. Upload via WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin
3. Activate the plugin
4. Configure SFTP settings in WheelPros Importer > Settings
